amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $10 million and increases the Defense Health Program by a similar amount for assistance to service individuals suffering from Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) and Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $10 million and increase the Other Department of Defense Programs Defense Health Program by $10 million for TIB/PTSD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
